reviewText: Cantinflas is the standard movie star in a Mexican family. Not only is he standard, but he touched the hearts of many with his films. This movie not only reminded me of my childhood, but it took my Dad back home! He loves the beautiful scenes of the old times when civilization in Mexico was coming up. Thank you so much tahoe_seller for an amazing memory!
Three movies in one D V D. The price was right too. I'm very happy with this.
Mario Moreno the best Mexican comedian ever
I love all of his movies, all laughter. I order his movies for my parents, big fans of him. There a stress refilled for them. Hehe!
The quality of the DVD was so poor that we could not watch it.  In fact, my husband threw it away!
